Name: janakshah89
Title: Most Beautiful river ever seen
Review: Beautiful Lake on the way to Leh, It looks mesmerising while driving from bike.Unfortunately No place to stay and take rest.Just enjoy the beauty while you are there.The river is as clean as you can drink it. Mostly chilly.The river turns Torquoise in colour towards the end of summer, the view then immensely beautiful.

Name: Aban Sheer
Title: Saw the sunrise
Review: Early in the morning I sat by the banks of River Tsarap Chu  and witnessed the red sunrise behind the Ladakh valley.

Name: SaddviAndalwala
Title: A nice evening
Review: I spent a nice evening sitting by the bank of Tsarap Chu River, watching the sunset behind the hills of Ladakh. The serving of a pot of hot tea (made of buffalo milk) added to the feeling.
